regarding another Tinkerer's item

>Date: Mon, 12 Jul 1999 11:04:29 -0300
>From: Entity <entity@...>
>X-Mailer: Mozilla 4.08 [en] (Win98; I)
>To: EQ-Spoilers@onelist.com
>Mailing-List: list EQ-Spoilers@onelist.com; contact
>EQ-Spoilers-owner@onelist.com
>Delivered-To: mailing list EQ-Spoilers@onelist.com
>List-Unsubscribe: <mailto:EQ-Spoilers-unsubscribe@...>
>Reply-to: EQ-Spoilers@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Spoilers] Solusek's Eye
>
>From: Entity <entity@...>
>
>I checked the bag again yesterday. The exact name of the bag is "Bag of
>the Tinkerers" and the price was 6511pp. Heh. The gnomes /con
>apprehensive to me tho and my charisma is the default human wizard value
>+ 5.
>
>I also saw a named gnome which didn't answer my Hails (again, must be
>because of the faction). He's on the 2nd floor on the little fortress
>(on the above floor of where the merchant is, I believe).
>
>Speaking of which, ever since I started this thread, the only new info I
>got was the goblin bartender one... Is there no one who actually
>explored this dungeon throughly or is everyone waiting to be spoonfed
>with a complete map with spawn locations and stuff? Or is this dungeon
>so crappy that no one ever wasted time actually exploring it...
>
>Oh and also, as far as I'm concerned, the only *dangerous* lava is at
>the entrance. After that, there is still some lava here and there but
>it isn't in dangerous/unescapable areas. There is one instance where my
>group has to jump in the lava and it's to reach the gnome
>castle/city/stronghold and most of the time, that lava doesn't hurt, tho
>I must admit it's funny seeing people jump around when lava hurts them.
>:D I believe you can avoid the lava jump and end up in the same place
>though but I'm just too lazy to find it as I think it involves fighting.
>
>--
>Azurathe FireWrath
>Erollisi Marr
>
>Schafer, Timothy L 1425 wrote:
> >
> > From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425" <Timothy.Schafer@...>
> >
> > Actually this bag is around 2000pp.
> >
> > Wenaddar

pp right now.
How about starting a collection? I'll donate 10pp. :)
